argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | hdmaplem1.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 2 |  | hdmaplem1.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 3 |  | hdmaplem1.w | |- ( ph -> W e. LMod ) |
| 4 |  | hdmaplem1.z | |- ( ph -> Z e. V ) |
| 5 |  | hdmaplem1.j | |- ( ph -> -. Z e. ( ( N ` { X } ) u. ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | hdmaplem1.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) |
| 7 |  | hdmaplem3.o | |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 9 | 1, 8, 2 | #P_lspsncl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ Y e. V ) -> ( N ` { Y } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 6, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( N ` { Y } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_elun2 | |- ( Z e. ( N ` { Y } ) -> Z e. ( ( N ` { X } ) u. ( N ` { Y } ) ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 11 | #P_nsyl | |- ( ph -> -. Z e. ( N ` { Y } ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 7, 8, 3, 10, 4, 12 | #P_lssneln0 | |- ( ph -> Z e. ( V \ { .0. } ) ) |
